mapper.select:
SELECT n.id,n.title,n.summary,n.status,n.create_date,n.news_date,qgq_category.category from qgq_news n left join qgq_category on n.fk_categoryid = qgq_category.id where n.del!=1
and `title` like concat('%', #{title}, '%')
and `fk_categoryid` like concat('%', #{fk_categoryid}, '%')
ORDER BY n.create_date desc
SELECT id, title, summary, content, news_Date, fk_categoryid, create_user, create_date from qgq_news where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qgq_news ( id, title, summary, content,news_Date,fk_categoryid,status, create_date, create_user, update_date, update_user, del ) VALUE ( #{id}, #{title}, #{summary},#{content},#{newsDate},#{fk_categoryid},'编辑状态', #{createDate}, #{createUser.id}, #{updateDate}, #{updateUser.id}, '0' )
mapper.update: UPDATE qgq_news m SET m.title = #{title}, m.summary = #{summary}, m.content = #{content}, m.fk_categoryid = #{fk_categoryid}, m.news_Date = #{newsDate}, m.update_date = #{updateDate}, m.update_user = #{updateUser.id} WHERE m.id = #{id}
